comment: It's really clever and cool how we managed to get Trump into office despite a minority of the votes, are lined up to keep the Senate despite a minority of the votes, and have achieved a Supreme Court that's appointed by a firmly minority government. But it's all really just biding time and building more pressure for when the anti-white demographic dam bursts.
amr:
# ::snt It's really clever and cool how we managed to get Trump into office despite a minority of the votes, are lined up to keep the Senate despite a minority of the votes, and have achieved a Supreme Court that's appointed by a firmly minority government. But it's all really just biding time and building more pressure for when the anti-white demographic dam bursts.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / clever-01
                  :ARG2 (m2 / manage-02
                        :ARG0 (w / we)
                        :ARG1 (g / get-05
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Trump"))
                              :ARG2 (o / office)
                              :concession (v / vote-01
                                    :quant (m3 / minority))))
                  :degree (r / really))
            :op2 (l / line-up-02
                  :ARG1 w
                  :purpose (k / keep-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Senate"))
                        :concession (v2 / vote-01
                              :quant (m4 / minority))))
            :op3 (a2 / achieve-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (g3 / government-organization
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Supreme"
                              :op2 "Court")
                        :ARG1-of (a3 / appoint-01
                              :ARG0 (g4 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g5 / govern-01)
                                    :mod (m5 / minority
                                          :ARG1-of (f / firm-03)))))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (b / bide-01
                        :ARG0 (a5 / all)
                        :ARG1 (t / time))
                  :op2 (b2 / build-01
                        :ARG0 a5
                        :ARG1 (p2 / pressure-01
                              :ARG1 a5
                              :mod (m6 / more))
                        :time (b3 / burst-02
                              :ARG1 (d / dam
                                    :mod (d2 / demography
                                          :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                                                :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                                      :ARG1-of (w2 / white-02))))))
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / real-04)
                        :mod (j / just)))))

comment: Please put an end to the vicious remarks toward others.
amr:
# ::snt Please put an end to the vicious remarks toward others.
(p / put-03
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (e / end-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (r / remark-01
                  :ARG3 (o / other)
                  :mod (v / vicious))))

comment: Antisemitism, racism and vehement ethnicity-based hatred, are reasons for banning this post.
amr:

(c / cause-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / antisemitism)
            :op2 (r / racism)
            :op3 (h / hatred
                  :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                        :ARG2 (e / ethnicity)
                        :degree (v / vehement))))
      :ARG1 (b2 / ban-01
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p / post-01)
                  :mod (t2 / this))))

comment: Please refrain from using derogatory terms for people of any race

                  :mod (d / derogatory))
